description: Conversion of rear of the shop into self contained studio. (Schedule 2, Part 3, Class G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
decision_conditions: The proposal involves the change of use of a building with a display window at ground floor level with part of the ground floor in use as a flat. The proposal would therefore be contrary to the requirement of provision G.1 (b) of Class G, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposal will not result in some or all of the parts of the building used for a use within, Class E of Schedule 2 to, the Use Classes Order to be situated on a floor below the lowest part of the building used as a flat, they will be on the same level. The proposal would therefore be contrary to the requirement of provision G.1 (a) of Class G, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
